select pmt.id, pmt.template_id, pmt.passage_id, pmt.passage_model_id, pmt.status, pmt.create_time, pmt.update_time, pmt.remark from mms_message_template mmt join mms_passage_message_template pmt on mmt.id = pmt.template_id where mmt.model_id = #{modelId} and pmt.passage_id = #{passageId} order by pmt.id desc limit 1
